description:
In Bus Driving Simulator 24 - City Roads, a new Articulated Bus joins the existing fleet, introducing an enhanced driving experience. With its articulated structure, this bus excels in navigating city streets, offering increased passenger capacity without compromising maneuverability.

As the driver, you'll tackle the challenge of handling the distinctive characteristics of this new Articulated Bus, mastering tight turns and delivering passengers seamlessly to their destinations.
name: Bus Driving Simulator 24 - City Roads DLC Articulated Bus
